FuncDef: The display vrrp state-change interface vrid command enables the system to trace changes in the status of a specified VRRP backup group.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays changes in the status of a VRRP backup group on a specified interface.
-

Displays changes in the status of a VRRP backup group on a specified interface.
-

Displays changes in the status of a VRRP backup group with a specified VRID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display vrrp state-change interface gigabitethernet 1/0/1.1 vrid 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If a VRRP backup group does not work properly, the display vrrp state-change interface vrid command can be used to trace changes in the VRRP status. Information about the last 10 changes in the VRRP status can be displayed. The command output includes the time when the status changed, the statuses before and after the change, and change reasons.
